page.title: 16A HONING SCHOOL DAY
page.content: In the mornings I let the kittens in for their food. When dad wakes up he makes pure orange drink for us from three oranges and a spponful of honey. After a breakfast of Ricicles I drink warm milk and sugar. Then I wash my face,clean my teeth and comb my hair. We come to school at 8.55am. in the mornings we have assembly and then usually read and do English language and maths activities. Recently I particularly enjoyed writing headlines for imaginary news reports. In maths I am learning about acute, obtuse and right angles. In the afternoons we do art and craft, music,science,topic work,story, games and dancing,for which, as there are so few of us, we travel to Dilham school, as do the pupils of Smallburgh school, on Friday afternoons. School closes at 3.30pm.
